text: wa<SIL>y@hiy<PAS> d*@bar=y@hwA<ZQP>h 'El=yw^onA<MER>h bEn='<HPA>mit*a<TIP>y le'mo<SIL>r:
q<TLM>w*m le<DAR>k@ 'El=ni<SIL>yn@we<TEB>h hA`i<MER>yr hag*@dw^olA<TIP>h w*q@rA<MUN>' `AlE<ATN>yhA k*i<SIL>y=`Al@tA<MER>h rA<SIL>`AtA<TIP>m l@pAnA<SIL>y:

way*A<MEH>qAm yw^onAh<PAS> lib@ro<MUN>xa t*ar@Si<ZQP>ySAh mil*ip@ne<TIP>y y@hwA<ATN>h way*e<AZL>rEd yAp<GER>w^o way*im@YA<MER>' '<HQA>niy*A<MUN>h | b*A'A<MUN>h tar@Si<RBM>yS way*it*e<AZL>n W@kArA<GER>h* way*e<MEH>rEd b*Ah*<PAS> lAb<MEH>w^o' `im*AhEm<PAS> t*ar@Si<ZQP>ySAh mil*ip@ne<TIP>y y@hwA<SIL>h:
wa<SIL>yhwA<RBM>h heTi<MEH>yl r<SIL>w*xa=g*@dw^olAh<PAS> 'El=hay*A<ZQP>m way@hi<MER>y sa<SIL>`ar=g*Ad<TIP>w^ol b*ay*A<ATN>m w@hA<MUN>'<HQA>niy*A<ZQP>h xiW/*.@bA<TIP>h l@hiW/*.Abe<SIL>r:

way*i<SIL>yr@'<MUN>w* ham*al*Axi<RBM>ym wa<SIL>y*iz@`<HPA>qw*<ZIN> 'i<MUN>yS 'El='<HSE>lohAyw<AST> way*ATi<AZL>lw* 'Et=hak*eli<GER>ym '<HPA>SE<MEH>r b*A<SIL>'<HQA>niy*Ah<PAS> 'El=hay*A<ZQP>m l@hAqe<TIP>l me<SIL>`<HPA>leyhE<ATN>m w@yw^onA<RBM>h yArad<PAS> 'El=yar@k*@te<MUN>y has*@piynA<ZQP>h way*iS@k*a<TIP>b way*e<SIL>rAda<SIL>m:

way*iq@ra<MEH>b 'elAyw<PAS> ra<MUN>b ha<SIL>xobe<ZQP>l way*o<MER>'mEr l<TIP>w^o mah=l*@kA<MUN> nir@d*A<ATN>m q<YET>w*m q@rA<MUN>' 'El='<HSE>lohE<ZQP>ykA 'w*la<GAR>y yit@`aW/*.e<DAR>t hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<TEB>ym lA<TIP>nw* w@lo<MER>' no'be<SIL>d:

way*o<SIL>'m@r<GAR>w* 'i<MUN>yS 'El=re`e<RBM>hw* l@kw*<PAS> w@nap*i<MUN>ylAh g<SIL>w^orAl<ZQP>w^ot w@ne<MUN>d@`A<ZQP>h b*@SEl*@mi<TEB>y hA<SIL>rA`A<MER>h haz*o<TIP>'t lA<ATN>nw* way*ap*i<AZL>lw*<PAS> g*<SIL>w^orAl<ZQP>w^ot way*ip*o<MER>l hag*w^orA<TIP>l `al=yw^onA<SIL>h:

way*o<SIL>'m@r<MUN>w* 'elA<ZQP>yw hag*iydAh=n*A<MUN>' lA<ZQP>nw* b*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<TEB>r l@miy=hA<SIL>rA`A<MER>h haz*o<TIP>'t lA<ATN>nw* mah=m*@la'k@t*@kA<PAS> w*me'a<MUN>yin t*Ab<ZQP>w^o' mA<MUN>h 'ar@YE<ZQP>kA w@'e<SIL>y=miz*E<MER>h `a<TIP>m 'A<SIL>t*Ah:

way*o<MER>'mEr '<HPA>leyhE<TIP>m `ib@ri<MUN>y 'Ano<ATN>kiy w@'Et=y@hwA<GAR>h '<HSE>lohe<MEH>y haW/*.Ama<AZL>yim<PAS> '<HPA>ni<MUN>y yAre<ZQP>' '<HPA>SEr=`AWA<MER>h 'Et=hay*A<TIP>m w@'Et=hay*ab*ASA<SIL>h:

way*i<SIL>yr@'<MEH>w* hA<SIL>'<HPA>nASiym<PAS> yir@'A<MUN>h g@dw^olA<ZQP>h way*o<SIL>'m@r<MER>w* 'elA<TIP>yw mah=z*o<MUN>'t `AWi<ATN>ytA k*i<SIL>y=yAd@`<MUN>w* hA<SIL>'<HPA>nASi<RBM>ym k*i<SIL>y=mil*ip@ne<MEH>y y@hwAh<PAS> h<MUN>w*' bore<ZQP>xa k*i<MER>y hig*i<TIP>yd lAhE<SIL>m:
way*o<SIL>'m@r<MEH>w* 'elAyw<PAS> mah=n*a<MUN>`<HPA>WEh l*A<ZQP>k@ w@yiS@t*o<MER>q hay*A<TIP>m me<SIL>`Ale<ATN>ynw* k*i<MER>y hay*A<TIP>m hw^ole<MER>k@ w@so`e<SIL>r:

way*o<MUN>'mEr '<HPA>leyhE<RBM>m WA'<AZL>w*niy<PAS> wa<SIL>h<HPA>Tiylu<MUN>niy 'El=hay*A<ZQP>m w@yiS@t*o<MER>q hay*A<TIP>m me<SIL>`<HPA>leykE<ATN>m k*i<YET>y yw^ode<MUN>`a 'A<ZQP>niy k*i<MUN>y b@SEl*i<ZQP>y has*a<DAR>`ar hag*Ad<TEB>w^ol haz*E<TIP>h `<HPA>leykE<SIL>m:
way*ax@t*@r<MUN>w* hA<SIL>'<HPA>nASi<RBM>ym l@hASi<TEB>yb 'El=hay*ab*ASA<TIP>h w@lo<MUN>' yAko<ATN>lw* k*i<MUN>y hay*A<ZQP>m hw^ole<MER>k@ w@so`e<TIP>r `<HPA>leyhE<SIL>m:

way*iq@r@'<AZL>w* 'El=y@hwA<GER>h way*o<SIL>'m@r<RBM>w* 'An*A<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> 'al=nA<MUN>' no<SIL>'b@dA<RBM>h b*@nE<AZL>pES<PAS> hA'i<MUN>yS haz*E<ZQP>h w@'al=t*it*e<MER>n `Ale<TIP>ynw* d*A<MUN>m nAqi<ATN>y' k*i<SIL>y='at*A<MUN>h y@hwA<ZQP>h k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MER>r xApa<TIP>Y@t*A `AWi<SIL>ytA:
way*iW@'w*<PAS> 'Et=yw^onA<ZQP>h way@Tilu<TIP>hw* 'El=hay*A<ATN>m way*a<SIL>`<HPA>mo<MER>d hay*A<TIP>m miz*a`@p*<SIL>w^o:
way*i<SIL>yr@'<DAR>w* hA<SIL>'<HPA>nASi<TEB>ym yir@'A<MER>h g@dw^olA<TIP>h 'Et=y@hwA<ATN>h way*i<SIL>z@b*@xw*=zE<AZL>bax<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h wa<SIL>y*id*@r<TIP>w* n@dAri<SIL>ym:
way@ma<MEH>n y@hwAh<PAS> d*A<MUN>g g*Ad<ZQP>w^ol lib@lo<TIP>`a 'Et=yw^onA<ATN>h way@hi<MEH>y yw^onAh<PAS> b*im@`e<MUN>y had*A<ZQP>g S@loSA<MER>h yAmi<TIP>ym w*S@loSA<MER>h leyl<SIL>w^ot:
way*it@p*al*e<MUN>l yw^onA<ZQP>h 'El=y@hwA<TIP>h '<HSE>lohA<ATN>yw mim*@`e<TIP>y had*AgA<SIL>h:
way*o<RBM>'mEr qA<TLM>rA'tiy miY*A<MER>rAh li<TEB>y 'El=y@hwA<TIP>h wa<SIL>y*a`<HPA>ne<ATN>niy mib*E<DAR>TEn S@'<TEB>w^ol Siw*a<TIP>`@t*iy SAma<MER>`@t*A qw^oli<SIL>y:
wat*aS@liyke<MEH>niy m@Yw*lAh<PAS> b*il@ba<MUN>b yam*i<ZQP>ym w@nAhA<TIP>r y@so<SIL>b@be<ATN>niy k*Al=miS@b*ArE<MER>ykA w@gal*E<TIP>ykA `Ala<MER>y `AbA<SIL>rw*:
wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<MUN>y 'Ama<ZQP>r@t*iy nig@ra<TIP>S@t*iy min*E<MUN>gEd `eynE<ATN>ykA 'a<YET>k@ 'w^osi<MUN>yp l@hab*i<ZQP>yT 'El=heyka<TIP>l qAd@SE<SIL>kA:
'<HPA>pAp<MEH>w*niy ma<AZL>yim<PAS> `ad=nE<ZQP>pES t*@h<TIP>w^om y@so<SIL>b@be<ATN>niy s<TIP>w*p xAb<MER>w*S l@ro'Si<SIL>y:
l@qiY@be<MEH>y hAriym<PAS> yAra<ZQP>d@t*iy hA'A<TEB>rEY b*@rixE<MER>yhA ba<SIL>`<HPA>di<TIP>y l@`w^olA<ATN>m wat*a<DAR>`al miW/*.a<TEB>xat xay*a<TIP>y y@hwA<MER>h '<HSE>lohA<SIL>y:
b*@hit@`aT*e<MEH>p `Alay<PAS> nap@Si<ZQP>y 'Et=y@hwA<TIP>h zAkA<ATN>r@t*iy wat*Ab<MEH>w^o' 'elE<AZL>ykA<PAS> t*@pil*Ati<ZQP>y 'El=heyka<TIP>l qAd@SE<SIL>kA:
m@Sam*@ri<TIP>ym hab@ley=SA<ATN>w@' xas@d*A<TIP>m ya<SIL>`<HPA>zo<SIL>bw*:
wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<RBM>y b*@q<MEH>w^ol t*w^odAh<PAS> 'Ez@b*@xAh=l*A<ZQP>k@ '<HPA>SE<MER>r nAda<TIP>r@t*iy '<HPA>Sal*e<ATN>mAh y@Sw*`A<TIP>tAh la<SIL>yhwA<SIL>h:
way*o<MER>'mEr y@hwA<TIP>h lad*A<ATN>g way*Aqe<MER>' 'Et=yw^onA<TIP>h 'El=hay*ab*ASA<SIL>h:
way@hi<DAR>y d@bar=y@hwA<TEB>h 'El=yw^onA<TIP>h Seni<MER>yt le'mo<SIL>r:
q<TEB>w*m le<MER>k@ 'El=ni<SIL>yn@we<TIP>h hA`i<MUN>yr hag*@dw^olA<ATN>h w*q@rA<MEH>' 'elE<AZL>yhA<PAS> 'Et=haq*@riy'A<ZQP>h '<HPA>SE<MER>r 'A<SIL>noki<TIP>y d*obe<MER>r 'elE<SIL>ykA:

way*A<MUN>qAm yw^onA<RBM>h way*e<TEB>lEk@ 'El=ni<SIL>yn@we<TIP>h k*id@ba<MUN>r y@hwA<ATN>h w@ni<SIL>yn@we<RBM>h hA<SIL>y@tA<MEH>h `iyr=g*@dw^olAh<PAS> le<SIL>'lohi<ZQP>ym ma<SIL>h<HPA>la<TIP>k@ S@lo<MER>SEt yAmi<SIL>ym:

way*A<MEH>xEl yw^onAh<PAS> lAb<MUN>w^o' bA`i<ZQP>yr ma<SIL>h<HPA>la<TIP>k@ y<MUN>w^om 'ExA<ATN>d way*iq@rA'<PAS> way*o'ma<ZQP>r `<YET>w^od 'ar@b*A`i<MUN>ym y<ZQP>w^om w@ni<SIL>yn@we<TIP>h nEh@p*A<SIL>kEt:
wa<SIL>y*a'<HPA>mi<TEB>ynw* 'an@Se<MER>y ni<SIL>yn@we<TIP>h b*e<SIL>'lohi<ATN>ym way*iq@r@'w*=Yw^om<PAS> way*il@b*@S<MUN>w* Waq*i<ZQP>ym mig*@dw^olA<TIP>m w@`ad=q@Tan*A<SIL>m:

way*ig*a<MEH>` had*AbAr<PAS> 'El=mE<MUN>lEk@ ni<SIL>yn@we<ZQP>h way*A<AZL>qAm<PAS> mik*is@'<ZQP>w^o way*a<SIL>`<HPA>be<MER>r 'ad*ar@t*<TIP>w^o me<SIL>`AlA<ATN>yw way@ka<MUN>s Wa<ZQP>q way*e<TIP>SEb `al=hA'e<SIL>pEr:

way*az@`e<RBM>q way*o<AZL>'mEr<PAS> b*@ni<SIL>yn@we<ZQP>h miT*a<DAR>`am ham*E<TEB>lEk@ w*g@dolA<TIP>yw le'mo<ATN>r hA<SIL>'AdA<AZL>m w@hab*@hemA<GER>h hab*AqA<MUN>r w@haY*o<RBM>'n 'a<SIL>l=yiT@`<HPA>mw*<PAS> m@'<ZQP>w*mAh 'a<AZL>l=yir@`<ZQP>w* w*ma<TIP>yim 'al=yiS@t*<SIL>w*:

w@yit@k*as*<MUN>w* Waq*i<RBM>ym hA<SIL>'AdAm<PAS> w@hab*@hemA<ZQP>h w@yiq@r@'<MER>w* 'El='<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym b*@xAz@qA<ATN>h w@yASu<RBM>bw* 'i<YET>yS mid*ar@k*<MUN>w^o hA<SIL>rA`A<ZQP>h w*min=hE<SIL>xAmA<TIP>s '<HPA>SE<MER>r b*@kap*eyhE<SIL>m:
mi<SIL>y=yw^ode<MUN>`a yAS<ZQP>w*b w@nixa<TIP>m hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<ATN>ym w@SA<TEB>b me<SIL>x<HPA>r<MER>w^on 'ap*<TIP>w^o w@lo<MER>' no'be<SIL>d:

way*a<MEH>r@' hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohiym<PAS> 'Et=ma<MUN>`<HPA>WeyhE<ZQP>m k*iy=SA<TIP>bw* mid*ar@k*A<MUN>m hA<SIL>rA`A<ATN>h way*in*A<MUN>xEm hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<RBM>ym `al=hA<SIL>rA`A<TEB>h '<HPA>SEr=d*ib*E<MER>r la<SIL>`<HPA>Ww^ot=lAhE<TIP>m w@lo<MER>' `AWA<SIL>h:
way*e<MER>ra` 'El=yw^onA<TIP>h rA`A<MUN>h g@dw^olA<ATN>h way*i<TIP>xar l<SIL>w^o:

way*it@p*al*e<AZL>l 'El=y@hwA<GER>h way*o'ma<RBM>r 'An*A<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> h<HPA>lw^o'=zE<MUN>h d@bAri<RBM>y `ad=h<HSE>yw^otiy<PAS> `al='ad@mAti<ZQP>y `al=k*e<MER>n qid*a<TIP>m@t*iy lib@ro<MUN>xa t*ar@Si<ATN>ySAh k*i<MUN>y yAda<RBM>`@t*iy k*i<MEH>y 'at*Ah<PAS> 'e<SIL>l=xan*<MUN>w*n w@rax<ZQP>w*m 'E<MEH>rEk@ 'ap*a<AZL>yim<PAS> w@rab=xE<ZQP>sEd w@nixA<TIP>m `al=hA<SIL>rA`A<SIL>h:
w@`at*A<MUN>h y@hwA<ZQP>h qax=nA<MER>' 'Et=nap@Si<TIP>y mim*E<ATN>n*iy k*i<TEB>y T<MER>w^ob mw^oti<TIP>y me<SIL>xay*A<SIL>y:
way*o<MUN>'mEr y@hwA<ZQP>h ha<SIL>heyTe<TIP>b xA<MER>rAh lA<SIL>k@:

way*eYe<MEH>' yw^onAh<PAS> min=hA`i<ZQP>yr way*e<TIP>SEb miq*E<MUN>dEm lA`i<ATN>yr way*a`aW<TLP> l<AZL>w^o SA<GER>m suk*A<RBM>h way*e<MEH>SEb t*ax@t*E<AZL>yhA<PAS> b*aY*e<ZQP>l `a<YET>d '<HPA>SE<MUN>r yir@'E<ZQP>h mah=y*i<SIL>h@yE<TIP>h b*A`i<SIL>yr:

way@ma<MUN>n y@hwA<SIL>h='<HSE><TLM>lohiym qi<SIL>yqAy<GAR>w^on way*a<MUN>`al | me`a<MUN>l l@yw^onA<RBM>h li<SIL>h@y<MER>w^ot Yel<PAS> `al=ro'S<ZQP>w^o l@haY*i<MER>yl l<TIP>w^o merA<SIL>`At<ATN>w^o way*iW@ma<MER>x yw^onA<TEB>h `al=haq*i<SIL>yqAy<TIP>w^on Wim@xA<MER>h g@dw^olA<SIL>h:
way@ma<MEH>n hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohiym<PAS> t*w^ola<ZQP>`at b*a<SIL>`<HPA>l<MER>w^ot haW/*.a<TIP>xar la<SIL>m*Ax<HQA>rA<ATN>t wat*a<MER>k@ 'Et=haq*i<SIL>yqAy<TIP>w^on way*iybA<SIL>S:

way@hi<MUN>y | k*iz@ro<MUN>xa haW/*.E<RBM>mES way@ma<AZL>n '<HSE>lohi<GER>ym r<MEH>w*xa qAdiym<PAS> x<HPA>riySi<ZQP>yt wat*a<MER>k@ haW/*.E<TEB>mES `al=ro<MER>'S yw^onA<TIP>h way*it@`al*A<ATN>p way*iS@'a<MEH>l 'Et=nap@Sw^o<PAS> lAm<ZQP>w*t way*o<ZQM>'mEr T<MER>w^ob mw^oti<TIP>y me<SIL>xay*A<SIL>y:
way*o<MEH>'mEr '<HSE>lohiym<PAS> 'El=yw^onA<ZQP>h ha<SIL>heyTe<MER>b xArA<SIL>h=l@kA<TIP> `al=haq*i<SIL>yqAy<ATN>w^on way*o<ZQM>'mEr heyTe<MER>b xA<SIL>rAh=li<TIP>y `ad=mA<SIL>wEt:

way*o<MUN>'mEr y@hwA<ZQP>h 'at*A<MER>h xa<AZL>s@t*A<PAS> `al=haq*i<MUN>yqAy<ZQP>w^on '<HPA>SE<TEB>r lo<SIL>'=`Ama<MER>l@t*A b*<TIP>w^o w@lo<MUN>' gid*al@t*<ATN>w^o SEb*in=la<MER>y@lAh hAyA<TIP>h w*bin=la<MER>y@lAh 'AbA<SIL>d:

wa<SIL>'<HPA>niy<PAS> lo<MUN>' 'Ax<ZQP>w*s `al=ni<SIL>yn@we<TIP>h hA`i<MUN>yr hag*@dw^olA<ATN>h '<HPA>SE<MUN>r yES=b*A<PAZ>h* har@b*eh<TLP> mi<SIL>S@t*eym=`EW@re<AZL>h rib*<GER>w^o 'AdA<RBM>m '<HPA>SE<MEH>r lo<SIL>'=yAda`<PAS> b*eyn=y@miyn<MUN>w^o liW@mo'l<ZQP>w^o w*b@hemA<TIP>h rab*A<SIL>h:
